area_name: Bend and Big Boned Area, The

content.description: Fun seam leads your through a bulge. A little heady over the bulge going to the steep seam in a blunt corner. Finish via edges and pockets up and left to the anchor!
content.protection: Micro to Med    TCU's, Lowe Balls nice
content.location: Just right of "Cutting Edge" before the Big bone OW zone.

climbs.name: One Small Step
climbs.fa: TR: Rusty Baillie RP: Josh Gross

content.location: Big Boned Area, Clip glue in and head right across chossy ledge.

content.description: Clip the high first bolt above the first moves over a choss pile. Splitter crack up to a bulge with a couple of funky moves before a ledge. Upper section of climb is fun, but has a lot of dirt. I wised I had my tooth brush with me to get all the silt off of my teeth at the bottom. Upper section with grit is no excuse to stay off of this great climb! Last move to clip the chains is a bit funky.
content.protection: One bolt, used camalots from .5 up to #4. Doubles of 1-4 are helpful depending on how much gear you want to place. Chains at the top.
content.location: Route is in the "Big Boned Area." Look for the bolt just above the mainly sandstone band at the base of the climb.Not on the Main Wall

pathTokens: Bend and Big Boned Area, The

content.description:
The Bend Area starts with the routes right of the main wall where the limestone band ends. First route in this area is the classic "Cutting Edge". 

  Big Boned Area is the steep zone starting with "Dancing Partner". Locate super steep (for Sullies) bulge above where the limestone band reappears. Glue in bolt protects the start of the three routes in this area.
